vulnerable.commit_message:
crypto: digest: use crypto_memneq()

When verifying a digest it is important not to leak timing information
through memcmp(). Use crypto_memneq() instead.

Signed-off-by: Sascha Hauer <s.hauer@pengutronix.de>
vulnerable.cve_desc: crypto/digest.c in Pengutronix barebox through 2021.07.0 leaks timing information because memcmp is used during digest verification.
